input.sentences: there was an interesting event that was going | so i went to investigate .
the people at the table selling tickets were very goth | i was a little wary but went with it .
in the theater | everything was a red monochrome going on | it gave it an interesting feel .
but then a bunch of performers came out and started announcing names .
it seemed to be some kind of ceremony | and these guys just sat up front looking pretty .
output.sentences: Our trip was so much fun.
These ladies were really nice and helpful to us and explained what to do.
They were getting ready to perform.
Loved the colors of the stage and outfits.
